entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
